arabicText: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَخْفَىٰ عَلَيْهِ شَىْءٌۭ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	nothing	is	hidden	from	Allah,	neither	in	
the	earth	nor	in	the	heavens.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	 par	 kuch	 chupa	 nahi	 zameen	 meiñ	
na	āasman	meiñ

arabicText: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُصَوِّرُكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْحَامِ كَيْفَ يَشَآءُ ۚ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
It	 is	 He	 Who	 fashions	 (moulds)	 you	 in	 your	
mothers’	wombs	as	He	wills;	none	is	worthy	of	
worship	 except	 Him,	 the	 Almighty	 (the	 Most	
Honourable),	the	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Wohi	 hai	 ke	 tumhāri	 tasweer	 banāta	 hai	
māoñ	 ke	 pet	meiñ	jaisi	 chāhe	 uske	 	 siwa	
kisi	ki	ibadat	nahi	izzat	wāla	hikmat	wāla

arabicText: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ عَلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مِنْهُ ءَايَـٰتٌۭ مُّحْكَمَـٰتٌ هُنَّ أُمُّ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَأُخَرُ مُتَشَـٰبِهَـٰتٌۭ ۖ فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ زَيْغٌۭ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ مَا تَشَـٰبَهَ مِنْهُ ٱبْتِغَآءَ ٱلْفِتْنَةِ وَٱبْتِغَآءَ تَأْوِيلِهِۦ ۗ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ تَأْوِيلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ۗ وَٱلرَّٰسِخُونَ فِى ٱلْعِلْمِ يَقُولُونَ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ كُلٌّۭ مِّنْ عِندِ رَبِّنَا ۗ وَمَا يَذَّكَّرُ إِلَّآ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
englishTranslationText:
It	 is	 He	 Who	 has	 sent	 down	 to	 you	 (O	 dear	
Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	 be	
upon	 him)	 this	 Book	 (the	 Qur’an)	 containing	
the	verses	that	have	a	clear	meaning	- they	are	
the	 core	 of	 the	 Book	 - and	 other	 verses	 the	
meanings	 of	 which	 are	 indistinct;	 those	 in	
whose	 hearts	 is	 deviation	 pursue	 the	 verses	 having	indistinct	meanings,	in	 order	 to	 cause	 turmoil	 and	
seeking	its	(wrongful)	interpretation;	 and	 only	Allah knows	its	 proper	interpretation;	 and	 those	 having	
sound	knowledge	say,	“We	believe	in	it,	all	of	it	is	 from	our	Lord”;	and	none	accept	guidance	except	 the	
men	of	understanding.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Wohi	hai	jis	ne	tum	par	yeh	Kitāb	utāri	is	
ki	 kuchh	 āayatyeñ	 sāf	 m'ana	 rakhti	 haiñ	
Woh	Kitāb	ki	asl	haiñ	aur	doosri	woh	haiñ	
jin	ke	m'ana	meiñ	ishtebāh	hai	woh	jin	ke	
diloñ	meiñ	kaji	hai	woh	ishtebāh	wāli	ke	
peeche	padte	haiñ	gumrāhi	chāhne	aur	is	ka	pehlu	dhoondne	ko	aur	is	ka	theek	pehlu	Allah	hi	
ko	ma'loom	hai	aur	pukhta	ilm	wāle	kehte	haiñ	ham	us	par	Imān	lāye	sab	hamāre	rab	ke	pās	se	
hai	aur	nasihat	nahi	mānte	magar	aql	wāle

arabicText: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ
englishTranslationText:
“Our	Lord!	Do	not	deviate	our	hearts	after	You	have	guided	us,	and	bestow	mercy	on	us	 from	Yourself;	
indeed	You	only	are	the	Great	Bestower.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Rab!	Hamāre	dil	terdhe	na	kar	b’ad	is	ke	ke	tu	ne	hameiñ	hidāyat	di	aur	hameiñ	apne	pās	se	
rahmat	a’ta	kar	beshak	tu	hai	bada	dene	wāla

arabicText: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ
englishTranslationText:
“Our	Lord!	Do	not	deviate	our	hearts	after	You	have	guided	us,	and	bestow	mercy	on	us	 from	Yourself;	
indeed	You	only	are	the	Great	Bestower.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Rab!	Hamāre	dil	terdhe	na	kar	b’ad	is	ke	ke	tu	ne	hameiñ	hidāyat	di	aur	hameiñ	apne	pās	se	
rahmat	a’ta	kar	beshak	tu	hai	bada	dene	wāla

arabicText: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ
englishTranslationText:
“Our	Lord!	Do	not	deviate	our	hearts	after	You	have	guided	us,	and	bestow	mercy	on	us	 from	Yourself;	
indeed	You	only	are	the	Great	Bestower.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Rab!	Hamāre	dil	terdhe	na	kar	b’ad	is	ke	ke	tu	ne	hameiñ	hidāyat	di	aur	hameiñ	apne	pās	se	
rahmat	a’ta	kar	beshak	tu	hai	bada	dene	wāla

arabicText: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ
englishTranslationText:
“Our	Lord!	Do	not	deviate	our	hearts	after	You	have	guided	us,	and	bestow	mercy	on	us	 from	Yourself;	
indeed	You	only	are	the	Great	Bestower.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Rab!	Hamāre	dil	terdhe	na	kar	b’ad	is	ke	ke	tu	ne	hameiñ	hidāyat	di	aur	hameiñ	apne	pās	se	
rahmat	a’ta	kar	beshak	tu	hai	bada	dene	wāla

arabicText: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ جَامِعُ ٱلنَّاسِ لِيَوْمٍۢ لَّا رَيْبَ فِيهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ
englishTranslationText:
“Our	Lord!	 Indeed	You	will	gather	all	mankind	 for	a	Day	about	which	 there	is	no	doubt";	indeed	Allah’s	
promise	does	not	change.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Rab!	 Hamāre	 beshak	 tu	 sab	 logoñ	 ko	 jama'	 karne	 wāla	 hai	 us	 din	 ke	 liye	 jis	 meiñ	 koi	
shub'ha	nahi	beshak	Allah	ka	w'ada	nahi	badalta

arabicText: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ جَامِعُ ٱلنَّاسِ لِيَوْمٍۢ لَّا رَيْبَ فِيهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ
englishTranslationText:
“Our	Lord!	 Indeed	You	will	gather	all	mankind	 for	a	Day	about	which	 there	is	no	doubt";	indeed	Allah’s	
promise	does	not	change.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Rab!	 Hamāre	 beshak	 tu	 sab	 logoñ	 ko	 jama'	 karne	 wāla	 hai	 us	 din	 ke	 liye	 jis	 meiñ	 koi	
shub'ha	nahi	beshak	Allah	ka	w'ada	nahi	badalta
